Rediseño del blog y freelanceo

Mar 23, 2010 in La semana pasada he estado dándole un pequeño rediseño al blog. El diseño que había era el resultante de haber hecho unas cuantas pruebas, y al final por falta de tiempo no había podido cambiarlo. Quería algo minimalista, con buena legibilidad, y con el menor número de imágenes posible. De hecho, la única imagen es el nuevo logo (a excepción de los iconos de social media, que son de [Komodo Media][1]). Y he creado un logo porque me embarco en la aventura del desarrollo freelance, y éste será mi nueva identidad visual. Últimamente estoy viendo mucha gente que se dedica a ello y me he decidido a dar el salto. Así que si alguien necesita un desarrollador Ruby on Rails, javascript, php, java o .NET, aquí me tenéis! [1]: http://www.komodomedia.com/ "Komodo Media" Tags: redesign  freelance

Who am I?

My name is Fernando Espinosa, a spanish guy passionate with web development and specialized in usability.

Where do I came from?

I have been developing software professionally for more than ten years. My career goes through companies like Soluziona or Indra amongst others. You can see my resume at Xing" title="Fernando Espinosa Jiménez"> or .

What do I do?

I develop web applications using agile methodologies and focusing on its usability. I do my best efforts creating clean, appealing and easy to use user interfaces. Without neglecting application features, of course.

How do I do it?

With the help of agile methodologies, prototyping since development starts and a fluent communication with the client, so I can respond his expectations and needs any time.

What tools do I use?

These are the ones which I feel more comfortable with:

  • Ruby on Rails
  • jQuery
  • HTML
  • CSS2 y CSS3
  • Mac OSX o Gentoo

But if the project requires it, I also manage Java and PHP (although I prefer avoiding them if possible ;-)).

About hiring me.

Do you need a freelance web developer and my profile has interested you? Tell me your needs and I’ll give you all details posible and a budget if needed.
